emailserver:stop

Full name:

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins:emailserver-maven-plugin:1.0.1:stop

Description:

Stop the email server(s).

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
monitorKey String 1.0.0 Key to provide when sending commands to the mail server.
User property is: emailserver.monitor.key.
monitorPort int 1.0.0 The port to listen on for the monitor commands.
User property is: emailserver.monitor.port.

Parameter Details

monitorKey:

Key to provide when sending commands to the mail server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: emailserver.monitor.key

monitorPort:

The port to listen on for the monitor commands.
  • Type: int
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: emailserver.monitor.port
